attributes.action: Proactively re-check DNA evidence for all prisoners who have continuously maintained their innocence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent miscarriages of justice point to the possibility that there are other innocent people being kept in prison based on flawed forensic evidence.  Technology has moved on considerably in the last decade alone.  All people still protesting their innocence; who were convicted using blood typing or early types of DNA analysis (which yielded lower degrees of uniqueness) should have their evidence re-tested as a matter of course without the need for further legal consideration or intervention.
